original: du ba des tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa zhes bya ba ni du ba dang lhan cig mer snang ba tshogs pa yin pa des na 'thob pa yin no //
analyzed: du ba des tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa zhes bya ba ni du ba dang lhan cig mer snang ba tshogs pa yin pa des na 'thob pa yin no //
translated: “That smoke is dependent on the same collection” means that the appearance of fire together with the smoke is the collection, and that is the attainment.

original: lkog tu gyur pa dang ma gyur pa ni gcig yin te /
analyzed: lkog tu gyur pa dang ma gyur pa ni gcig yin te /
translated: “The manifest and the unmanifest are the same” means that the manifest and the unmanifest are the same.

original: des na gang gis du ba bskyed pa de nyid thob pa yin gyi tshogs pa gcig la rag lus pa ni ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: des na gang gis du ba bskyed pa de nyid thob pa yin gyi tshogs pa gcig la rag lus pa ni ma yin no zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the one who generates the smoke is the one who attains it, and it is not dependent on the same collection.

original: bag chags kyi dbang zhes bya ba ni lhag par zhen pa'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: bag chags kyi dbang zhes bya ba ni lhag par zhen pa'i dbang gis so //
translated: “The power of latent impressions” means the power of attachment.

original: phyi rol la mi slu ba dang mthong ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol la mi slu ba dang mthong ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no such thing as nondeception in regard to external things, nor is there any seeing of them.

original: rmi lam na yang srid pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi smra lugs yin no //
analyzed: rmi lam na yang srid pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi smra lugs yin no //
translated: This is the way of speaking in the world.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni thams cad du 'byung bar 'gyur ba yul can nyid tshad ma ma yin la de yang phyi rol la srid pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin na'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni thams cad du 'byung bar 'gyur ba yul can nyid tshad ma ma yin la de yang phyi rol la srid pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa yin na'o //
translated: The words “in the same way” and so on indicate that the cognition of an object that is about to arise is not a valid cognition, and that such a cognition is not possible in regard to external things.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rnam pa des so //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba ni rnam pa des so //
translated: “ In the same way” means by that same method.

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don rtogs pa med na'o //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don rtogs pa med na'o //
translated: “ Otherwise” means if there were no cognition of an object that is about to arise.

original: gal te 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang da ltar bdag gcig tu lhag par sgro btags nas zhugs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i yul can du ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang da ltar bdag gcig tu lhag par sgro btags nas zhugs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i yul can du ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: If one were to assume that the object that is about to arise and the present object are identical, how could there be a cognition of an object that is about to arise?

original: da ltar ba yang sgro btags pa'i phyir ro zhe na /🔽rig pa ni thob pas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: da ltar ba yang sgro btags pa'i phyir ro zhe na / rig pa ni thob pas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because the present object is also a superimposed object.

original: yid mod des cing 'gyur snyam na /
analyzed: yid mod des cing 'gyur snyam na /
translated: “ By the attainment of knowledge” means by the attainment of the object.🔽What is the use of that cognition?

original: des na zhes smos so //
analyzed: des na zhes smos so //
translated: Therefore, he says.

original: bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the reversal, i.e., because of the attainment.

original: shas pa'i dus na yod pa ma yin pa des na ji ltar shes pa skyed par byed pa yin zhes bram zhes smras pa gang yin pa de gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: shas pa'i dus na yod pa ma yin pa des na ji ltar shes pa skyed par byed pa yin zhes bram zhes smras pa gang yin pa de gsal ba yin no //
translated: The point of the question, “How can that which does not exist at the time of the cognition be the cause of the arising of the cognition?” is clarified.🔽How is it clarified? By the phrase “in the future.”🔽The point of the question, “How can that which does not exist at the time of the cognition be the cause of the arising of the cognition?” is clarified.

original: ji ltar gsal ba snyam na 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gsal ba snyam na 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'o //
translated: How is it clarified? By the phrase “in the future.”

original: mngon sum la sogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don la ltos nas tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don la ltos nas tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin te /
translated: Direct perception, etc., are not the reasons for the conventional usage in regard to the object in the future,

original: yod pa dmigs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de yang spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: yod pa dmigs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de yang spangs pa yin no //
translated: because they apprehend the existent. This is also rejected.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mer snang ba dang lhan cig nyid du'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mer snang ba dang lhan cig nyid du'o //
translated: Together with the appearance of the fire in the future.

original: de'i ngo bor zhes bya ba ni me'i ngo bor spang ba la'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bor zhes bya ba ni me'i ngo bor spang ba la'o //
translated: In the nature of that, i.e., in the nature of fire.

original: snang ba mtshams sbyong ldan zhes bya ba ni rgyud du @304b 'jug ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snang ba mtshams sbyong ldan zhes bya ba ni rgyud du @304b 'jug ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The appearance is connected, i.e., it is included in the stream.

original: de'i tshe de rmi lam gyi bden pa nyid ma yin yang zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi bden pa yin yang de 'dra ba'i bde ba rgyun gyis skye ba yin na /
analyzed: de'i tshe de rmi lam gyi bden pa nyid ma yin yang zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi bden pa yin yang de 'dra ba'i bde ba rgyun gyis skye ba yin na /
translated: At that time, although it is not the reality of a dream, although it is the reality of a dream, if such pleasure were to arise continuously,

original: khyod la chad pa ci yod thar pa 'dod pa de dag gi chos la 'jug pa gang yin pa de na 'khor ba de'i bzlog pa thob pa'i don du yin no //
analyzed: khyod la chad pa ci yod thar pa 'dod pa de dag gi chos la 'jug pa gang yin pa de na 'khor ba de'i bzlog pa thob pa'i don du yin no //
translated: what is the harm to you? The engagement in the Dharma of those who desire liberation is for the purpose of attaining the opposite of that cyclic existence.

original: chos la 'dod pa yang mngon par 'dod pa 'ga' zhig gis 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos la 'dod pa yang mngon par 'dod pa 'ga' zhig gis 'jug pa ni ma yin no //
translated: And the desire for the Dharma is not engagement by any desire for manifest existence.

original: 'dir gal te zhes bya bas dogs pa bsu ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir gal te zhes bya bas dogs pa bsu ba'o //
translated: Here, if is a response to a doubt.

original: bag chags kyang gang yang rung bas snang ba'i rgyu ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rigs mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: bag chags kyang gang yang rung bas snang ba'i rgyu ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang rigs mthun pa yin no //
translated: Also, a latent imprint is not the cause of the appearance of anything whatsoever, but rather it is of a concordant type.

original: ston pa ni de yang zhes bya bar mer snang ba'o //
analyzed: ston pa ni de yang zhes bya bar mer snang ba'o //
translated: The teacher says that that also is the appearance of fire.

original: de'i bag chags ni du ba'i bag chags so //
analyzed: de'i bag chags ni du ba'i bag chags so //
translated: Its latent imprint is the latent imprint of smoke.

original: sngar byung ba rang bzhin gang gis ngo bor snang bas rab tu sbyar ba'i bag chags 'du byed ces bya bar grags pa de ni de'i ngo bor snang ba'i rgyu yin gyi /
analyzed: sngar byung ba rang bzhin gang gis ngo bor snang bas rab tu sbyar ba'i bag chags 'du byed ces bya bar grags pa de ni de'i ngo bor snang ba'i rgyu yin gyi /
translated: The latent impressions of the application of the past to the nature of the appearance are known as formations. They are the cause of the appearance as that nature.

original: rang bzhin gzhan du snang ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan du snang ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that another nature appears.

original: de ni zhes bya ba du bar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba du bar snang ba'o //
translated: “That” refers to the appearance as smoke.

original: bag chags gzhan gyis bskyed par bya ba du bar snang ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa des ni skyed byed ma yin pa gzhan me'i bag chags zhes bya ba go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bag chags gzhan gyis bskyed par bya ba du bar snang ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa des ni skyed byed ma yin pa gzhan me'i bag chags zhes bya ba go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The latent impressions that are to be generated by the appearance as smoke do not cause the understanding of the latent impressions of fire, which is not the generator.

original: yang ci ltar na dus mtshungs pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci ltar na dus mtshungs pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that they are simultaneous?

original: ma 'ongs pa ni zhes smos pas so //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ni zhes smos pas so //
translated: Because it says “the future,”

original: skad cig 'di la zhes bya ba dang da ltar skad cig tu go'am ci ste ma yin pa nyid du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: skad cig 'di la zhes bya ba dang da ltar skad cig tu go'am ci ste ma yin pa nyid du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “in this moment” means “in the present moment.” What is the meaning of “or not”?

original: de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba 'di lta'i dus nyid du'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba 'di lta'i dus nyid du'o //
translated: “At that very time” means “at that very moment.”

original: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi'o //
translated: “If” refers to the other.

original: 'di la grub pa'i mtha' pa 'dra ba ni ji ltar tshad ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la grub pa'i mtha' pa 'dra ba ni ji ltar tshad ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, what is similar to a philosophical tenet? is what is valid cognition?

original: 'dir gzhan gyis don ston pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
analyzed: 'dir gzhan gyis don ston pa'i phyir zhes smos so //
translated: Here, because of teaching other things is stated.

original: lan ni bstan pas kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lan ni bstan pas kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The answer is because of teaching, and so on.

original: des kyang zhes bya ba ni da ltar bas so //
analyzed: des kyang zhes bya ba ni da ltar bas so //
translated: By that means by the present.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni dogs pa bsu pa'o //
translated: The future is anticipated by will arise.

original: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'o //
analyzed: 'di yang zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'o //
translated: This is the present.

original: rgyu da ltar yod pa'i skad cig la 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa'i skad cig nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu da ltar yod pa'i skad cig la 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa'i skad cig nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the effect, the future moment, is designated in proximity to the cause, the present moment.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni gal te zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Here, if is stated.

original: des zhes bya ba bag chags kyis so //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba bag chags kyis so //
translated: By that means by the latent tendency.

original: don la yang zhes bya ba ni phyi rol la yang mtshungs te /
analyzed: don la yang zhes bya ba ni phyi rol la yang mtshungs te /
translated: Also with regard to the object means that it is the same with regard to external objects.

original: da lta'i skad cig ni don bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: da lta'i skad cig ni don bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the present moment does not perform the function of the object.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni da ltar ba'o //
translated: That is the present.

original: bag chags la yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bag chags la yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Also with regard to the latent tendency means

original: bag chags kyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mer snang ba'i don byed pa yin pa'i phyir bag @305a * //
analyzed: bag chags kyi 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mer snang ba'i don byed pa yin pa'i phyir bag @305a * //
translated: Because it is the meaning-generality that is the cause of the appearance of fire, which is the result of the latent potentialities.

original: chags la yang de byed par brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chags la yang de byed par brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Therefore, the latent potentialities are also said to be the cause of that.

original: slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi glang pos so //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi glang pos so //
translated: The master means Dignāga.

original: gang gi phyir rnam par shes par smra ba nyid rigs kyi phyi rol du smra ba ni rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rnam par shes par smra ba nyid rigs kyi phyi rol du smra ba ni rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is logical to be a proponent of consciousness, but illogical to be a proponent of external objects.

original: phyi'i don kho na la tshul gnyis yin no zhes bya ba ba ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: phyi'i don kho na la tshul gnyis yin no zhes bya ba ba ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it that the two modes are only with regard to external objects?

original: tha dad pa dag la ni zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: tha dad pa dag la ni zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said, “with regard to different things.”

original: de nyid ces bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba ni 'dzin par byed pa'o //
translated: That itself means apprehending.

original: 'dis ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rjes su 'gro ba brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rjes su 'gro ba brjod do //
translated: This expresses the conformity with the apprehended.

original: da ni gzung ba la brjod pa ni /
analyzed: da ni gzung ba la brjod pa ni /
translated: Now, with regard to the object of apprehension,

original: sngon po de nyid ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngon po de nyid ces bya ba'o //
translated: it is said, “that very blue.”

original: sngar ser po 'dzin pa'i dus su mthong ba'i 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de nyid sngon po 'dzin pa'i dus na yang yin la /
analyzed: sngar ser po 'dzin pa'i dus su mthong ba'i 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de nyid sngon po 'dzin pa'i dus na yang yin la /
translated: The aspect of the apprehender that was seen when previously apprehending yellow is the same as that which is seen when apprehending blue.🔽In the same way, the entity that is apprehended by the aspect of suffering is the same as that which is apprehended by the aspect of pleasure.

original: de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi rnam pas gzung ba'i dngos po la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid bde ba'i rnam pas 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba ni shes pa 'di yang mngon sum yin nam 'on te rjes su dpag pa yin zhes rnam par rtogs
analyzed: de bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi rnam pas gzung ba'i dngos po la sogs pa gang yin pa de nyid bde ba'i rnam pas 'dzin pa yin no zhes bya ba ni shes pa 'di yang mngon sum yin nam 'on te rjes su dpag pa yin zhes rnam par rtogs
translated: This is the thought: Is this cognition direct perception or is it inference?

original: pa'o // rnam pa gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni dgag pa'i rang bzhin las rnam pa gzhan du gsal ba dang / mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
analyzed: pa'o // rnam pa gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni dgag pa'i rang bzhin las rnam pa gzhan du gsal ba dang / mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du'o //
translated: Another aspect means an aspect that is different from the nature of negation, such as the nature of clarity or the nature of obscurity.

original: 'on te dag pa'i rang bzhin gcig nyid rnam pa sna tshogs par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dag pa'i rang bzhin gcig nyid rnam pa sna tshogs par 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Or is it that a single entity of the nature of clarity becomes various aspects?

original: ji ltar zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes gsungs so //
translated: How?

original: 'on te don yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa kho na'o snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te don yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa kho na'o snyam na /
translated: Or is it that the object is just various?

original: don ni ma yin te zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: don ni ma yin te zhes gsungs so //
translated: The object is not.

original: dper na shes pa zla ba'i rnam pa nyid du khas blangs pa la /
analyzed: dper na shes pa zla ba'i rnam pa nyid du khas blangs pa la /
translated: For example, it is like the case where one accepts that the aspect of the moon is consciousness,

original: rab rib la sogs pa'i stobs kyis gnyis kyi rnam par yang 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: rab rib la sogs pa'i stobs kyis gnyis kyi rnam par yang 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: but due to the power of cataracts and so on, it appears as two.

original: gang gi tshe don gyi rnam pa nyid ma yin pa de'i tshe ni rnam pa gzhan nyid lhag par yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: gang gi tshe don gyi rnam pa nyid ma yin pa de'i tshe ni rnam pa gzhan nyid lhag par yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: When it is not the aspect of the object itself, then it is definitely not another aspect.

original: / don dam par mar me'i rang bzhin de 'dra bar skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: / don dam par mar me'i rang bzhin de 'dra bar skyes pa yin te /
translated: The ultimate nature of the lamp is born in that way,

original: des na de ltar mthong ba yin gyi de'i shes pa'i rnam pa ni ma yin no zhe na de'i tshe zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: des na de ltar mthong ba yin gyi de'i shes pa'i rnam pa ni ma yin no zhe na de'i tshe zhes gsungs so //
translated: and thus it is seen in that way, but it is not the aspect of its consciousness.

original: yang na de yang zhes bya ba rab rib kyis mig gi nus par byas pa yang ngo //
analyzed: yang na de yang zhes bya ba rab rib kyis mig gi nus par byas pa yang ngo //
translated: Or, “that” refers to the eye’s potential that is made by cataracts.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni mig gi nus pa'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni mig gi nus pa'o //
translated: “That” refers to the eye’s potential.

original: nus ba nyams par brtags pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi 'bras bu de yang bden pa mthong ba'am mi bden pa mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: nus ba nyams par brtags pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi 'bras bu de yang bden pa mthong ba'am mi bden pa mthong ba yin no //
translated: The result of the cause that is imagined to be the impairment of the potential is either seeing truly or seeing falsely.

original: gal te bden pa mthong zhing nyams par brtag par bya ba ni mi bden pa mthong ba la ni shin tu brtag par 'gyur ro //🔽des nam nyams pa zhes bya ba med par 'gyur @305b ngo ;
analyzed: gal te bden pa mthong zhing nyams par brtag par bya ba ni mi bden pa mthong ba la ni shin tu brtag par 'gyur ro // des nam nyams pa zhes bya ba med par 'gyur @305b ngo ;
translated: If it is the case that the seeing of the truth is to be examined as a degeneration, then the seeing of the untrue would be a degeneration.🔽But if it is the case that the seeing of the truth is not a degeneration, then the seeing of the untrue would not be a degeneration.

original: /'on te de 'dra ba'i mar me'i yod pa yin yang gzhan gyis bltas med pa yin la de mthong bas dbang po nyams pa yin no snyam /
analyzed: /'on te de 'dra ba'i mar me'i yod pa yin yang gzhan gyis bltas med pa yin la de mthong bas dbang po nyams pa yin no snyam /
translated: But if it is the case that the lamp exists in that way, but is not seen by another, then the sense faculty is degenerate because of seeing it.

original: de lta yin na zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de lta yin na zhes gsungs so //
translated: If that were so, it would be as stated.

original: de ltar yang ma yin te zhes bya ba ni 'di gzhan gyis bltar med pa'i mar me mthong ba yin yang bum pa la sogs pa gsal bar mi mthong ba yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin te zhes bya ba ni 'di gzhan gyis bltar med pa'i mar me mthong ba yin yang bum pa la sogs pa gsal bar mi mthong ba yin te /
translated: But it is not like that. Even though the lamp is seen by another, the pot and so on are not seen clearly.

original: des na 'di yang dag pa'i mar me'i mthong ba can yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di yang dag pa'i mar me'i mthong ba can yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the seeing of a true lamp.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ngang yang dag pa ma yin pa la'o //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ngang yang dag pa ma yin pa la'o //
translated: Because there is no distinction between the true and the untrue.

original: spong ba mthong yang gang gis gcig ni yang dag pa mthong la gzhan ni yang dag pa ma yin pa mthong bar 'gyur ba khyad par gzhan gang zhig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spong ba mthong yang gang gis gcig ni yang dag pa mthong la gzhan ni yang dag pa ma yin pa mthong bar 'gyur ba khyad par gzhan gang zhig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: But what is the difference between the two, that one is seeing reality and the other is not?

original: gal te yod pa yin na 'o na mar me de ji ltar gzhan gyis mi mthong snyam du dogs pa bsu nas mthong ba mi 'thad pa zhes smos so //
analyzed: gal te yod pa yin na 'o na mar me de ji ltar gzhan gyis mi mthong snyam du dogs pa bsu nas mthong ba mi 'thad pa zhes smos so //
translated: If it exists, then why can’t others see it?

original: de lta na yang zhes bya ba ni rab rib la sogs pas bskyed pa yin yang ngo //
analyzed: de lta na yang zhes bya ba ni rab rib la sogs pas bskyed pa yin yang ngo //
translated: Even so,🔽the other

original: gzhan ni zhes bya ba mar me'i'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni zhes bya ba mar me'i'o //
translated: is the light of the lamp.

original: shes pa gzhan du yul snang bar khas len pas na'o //
analyzed: shes pa gzhan du yul snang bar khas len pas na'o //
translated: Because it is accepted that the object appears in the consciousness.🔽The impossibility is stated:

original: mi rung ba brjod pa ni gang du zhes bya ba dang / gang du yul rang gi ngo bos snang ba'i rnam par shes pa la snang ba yin na thub pa med do //
analyzed: mi rung ba brjod pa ni gang du zhes bya ba dang / gang du yul rang gi ngo bos snang ba'i rnam par shes pa la snang ba yin na thub pa med do //
translated: If the object appears in the consciousness by virtue of its own nature, then there is no escape.

original: 'on te shes pa gang la yul snang ba de las gzhan la snang ba ma yin no snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te shes pa gang la yul snang ba de las gzhan la snang ba ma yin no snyam na /
translated: But if you think that the object does not appear in the consciousness other than as it is,

original: rang snang ba zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rang snang ba zhes gsungs so //
translated: It is said to be self-illuminating.

original: 'o na te mar me'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyis yul du shes pa snang ba yin la /
analyzed: 'o na te mar me'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyis yul du shes pa snang ba yin la /
translated: But if the object is illuminated by the nature of the circle of the lamp,

original: shes pa la yul snang ba yin no zhes na /
analyzed: shes pa la yul snang ba yin no zhes na /
translated: and the object appears to consciousness,🔽then, it is said,

original: gal te zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te zhes gsungs so //
translated: if that were so,

original: de lta bu la sogs pa'i gnod pa byed pa yod pa de bas na'o //
analyzed: de lta bu la sogs pa'i gnod pa byed pa yod pa de bas na'o //
translated: then there would be such faults as that.

original: de'i rang bzhin gyi zhes bya ba ni shes pa dang 'dra ba yul yin yi snang ba tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gyi zhes bya ba ni shes pa dang 'dra ba yul yin yi snang ba tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: The nature of that is like consciousness, but it is not merely an appearance.

original: gal te rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam pa can mar me'i dkyil 'khor la yang de kho na bzhin du nus pa brtag par bya ba yin no snyam na /
analyzed: gal te rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam pa can mar me'i dkyil 'khor la yang de kho na bzhin du nus pa brtag par bya ba yin no snyam na /
translated: If you think that the circle of the lamp that has the aspect of the eye of a peacock is also to be imagined in the same way,

original: rma bya'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rma bya'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then it is said, “the eye of a peacock.”

original: ka ba la sogs pa yang shes pa las tha dad par ji ltar 'grub snyam na /
analyzed: ka ba la sogs pa yang shes pa las tha dad par ji ltar 'grub snyam na /
translated: If you think that even a pillar and so on are established as different from consciousness,

original: ka ba zhes smos so //
analyzed: ka ba zhes smos so //
translated: then it is said, “a pillar.”

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni me la sogs pa'i 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam pa la'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni me la sogs pa'i 'dir yang zhes bya ba ni rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam pa la'o //
translated: The word “and so on” refers to fire and so on.

original: de dag la zhes bya ba ni rab rib kyis bslad pa gzhan rnams yang 'khrul pa nyid mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la zhes bya ba ni rab rib kyis bslad pa gzhan rnams yang 'khrul pa nyid mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Those” refers to others who are affected by cataracts, because they are similar in being mistaken.

original: 'on te de dag na bden pa kho na mthong ba yin pas ji ltar de dag 'khrul pa yin snyam na /
analyzed: 'on te de dag na bden pa kho na mthong ba yin pas ji ltar de dag 'khrul pa yin snyam na /
translated: But if you think that they see only what is real, how could they be mistaken?

original: 'khrud pa zhes bya ba'o //🔽gnyis ka yang zhes bya @306a * //
analyzed: 'khrud pa zhes bya ba'o // gnyis ka yang zhes bya @306a * //
translated: “Mistaken” is the term.

original: ba ni rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i skyes bu gnyis gang la yang ngo //
analyzed: ba ni rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i skyes bu gnyis gang la yang ngo //
translated: “Both” refers to the two people who experience the pattern of the peacock’s tail feather.

original: 'khrul pa nyid du 'dod pa'i skyes bus dmigs pa'i me de ni'o //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid du 'dod pa'i skyes bus dmigs pa'i me de ni'o //
translated: The fire that is observed by the person who is considered to be mistaken is not nonexistent in reality.

original: sa gzhi'i tshig pa ma mthong ba yang don nyid las mi nyams so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa gzhi'i tshig pa ma mthong ba yang don nyid las mi nyams so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The burning of the ground is not seen” means that it is not seen by the person who is not affected by cataracts.
